Great photographer and lovely woman. One of my favourite @NLIreland photo collections. https://t.co/ZFgN2hJl5Y

@damienmulley Suspect @Limerick1914 has always been amazing, but certainly has been since 2012!
@gutterbookshop Cat Time is faster than Human Time.

@emilymfg Excellent! If @david_monahan's not Visualising Migration, I don't know who is... @UCD_arthistory
@emilymfg Until the end of March, Emily. You should bring your students to meet @david_monahan and hear about his project!
@ireland The Happy Prince still makes me cry.
@Library_RIA Thanks. And lovely Colm Lennon!
@artursikora Off in that direction now. Will hopefully make me hate it slightly less, as you made some good come out of it! :)
@artursikora Far more productive that you turn it into art! :) I glare at it every day and wish it gone, but that's pointless.
@artursikora Delighted for you, congratulations! (Though I hate that site. Not convinced I'll love the finished building either.)
@Kitsgirl1 Thank you! :)
@Kitsgirl1 Excellent, thanks Mrs!
@Kitsgirl1 I miss your recipes. Still make your Mince a Cinch.
@PhotosOfThePast Oooooh, have always fancied Fancy Goods!
@PhotosOfThePast Used to do that at Library Towers. Tempted to unfollow/refollow to see what I get.
@Library_RIA Gorgeous collection! What did the Guild of St. Anne do?
@magnumlady Jeepers, they're going to get a shock to the system tomorrow.

@TCDLib1916 Farewell, and thank you!
@psycicflower Great spot to do it from anything I've heard. Very best of luck with it.
@psycicflower oh Mrs, I didn't know. Congratulations, and yes it does!

The Dodder as still as a mirror this morning. https://t.co/SYPBpOLqqW
